actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the refunding of so much of a taxpayer's investment credit as exceeds his liability for income tax.
short_title: Refundable Investment Tax Credit Act of 1983

summary.text: Refundable Investment Tax Credit Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the refunding of investment tax credit amounts which exceed tax liability.

titles.title: Refundable Investment Tax Credit Act of 1983
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the refunding of so much of a taxpayer's investment credit as exceeds his liability for income tax.
